mode.name: active_org_admins
mode.query: SELECT ugm.user_id FROM rhnUserGroupMembers ugm WHERE ugm.user_group_id = (SELECT id FROM rhnUserGroup WHERE org_id = :org_id AND group_type = (SELECT id FROM rhnUserGroupType WHERE label = 'org_admin')) AND exists (select wc.id from rhnwebcontactenabled wc where wc.id = ugm.user_id) ORDER BY ugm.user_id

mode.name: active_org_admin_emails
mode.query: SELECT wupi.email FROM web_user_personal_info wupi, rhnUserGroupMembers ugm WHERE ugm.user_group_id = (SELECT id FROM rhnUserGroup WHERE org_id = :org_id AND group_type = (SELECT id FROM rhnUserGroupType WHERE label = 'org_admin')) AND exists (select wc.id from rhnwebcontactenabled wc where wc.id = ugm.user_id) AND exists (select rui.user_id from rhnUserInfo rui where rui.user_id = ugm.user_id and tasko_notify = 'Y') AND wupi.web_user_id = ugm.user_id

mode.name: all_sat_admins
mode.query: SELECT ugm.user_id FROM rhnUserGroupMembers ugm WHERE ugm.user_group_id IN (SELECT id FROM rhnUserGroup WHERE group_type = (SELECT id FROM rhnUserGroupType WHERE label = 'satellite_admin')) AND exists (select wc.id from web_contact wc where wc.id = ugm.user_id and read_only = 'N') ORDER BY ugm.user_id

mode.name: active_sat_admins
mode.query: SELECT ugm.user_id FROM rhnUserGroupMembers ugm WHERE ugm.user_group_id IN (SELECT id FROM rhnUserGroup WHERE group_type = (SELECT id FROM rhnUserGroupType WHERE label = 'satellite_admin')) AND exists (select wc.id from rhnwebcontactenabled wc where wc.id = ugm.user_id) AND exists (select wc.id from web_contact wc where wc.id = ugm.user_id and read_only = 'N') ORDER BY ugm.user_id

mode.name: in_set
mode.query:
SELECT DISTINCT WC.id, WC.login_uc,UI.last_logged_in
FROM web_contact WC inner join rhnSet ST on ST.element = WC.id inner join rhnUserInfo UI on UI.user_id = wc.id WHERE ST.user_id = :user_id AND ST.label = :set_label ORDER BY WC.login_uc

mode.name: users_in_org
mode.query: SELECT wc.id AS ID, wc.login, wc.login_uc, wc.org_id, UI.last_logged_in FROM web_contact wc inner join rhnUserInfo UI on UI.user_id = wc.id WHERE wc.org_id = :org_id ORDER BY wc.login_uc

mode.name: all_users_in_multiorg
mode.query: SELECT wc.id AS ID, wc.login, wc.org_id, wc.login_uc FROM web_contact wc ORDER BY wc.login_uc

datasource_modes.query: SELECT UIOO.user_id as id, user_login, user_first_name, user_last_name, rhn_user.check_role(user_id, 'org_admin') as org_admin, rhn_user.check_role(user_id, 'satellite_admin') as sat_admin, wc.name as org_name, wupi.email as address FROM rhnUsersInOrgOverview UIOO, web_customer wc, web_user_personal_info wupi WHERE UIOO.user_id IN (%s) AND wc.id = UIOO.org_id AND wupi.web_user_id = uioo.user_id ORDER BY UPPER(user_login), UIOO.user_id

mode.name: users_in_multiorg
mode.query: SELECT wc.id AS ID, wc.login, wc.login_uc FROM web_contact wc WHERE wc.org_id = :org_id ORDER BY wc.login_uc

datasource_modes.query: SELECT UIOO.user_id as id, user_login, user_first_name, user_last_name, rhn_user.check_role(user_id, 'org_admin') as org_admin, wupi.email as address FROM rhnUsersInOrgOverview UIOO, web_user_personal_info wupi WHERE UIOO.user_id IN (%s) AND wupi.web_user_id = uioo.user_id ORDER BY UPPER(user_login), UIOO.user_id

mode.name: active_in_org
mode.query: SELECT wce.id AS ID, wce.login, wce.login_uc, UI.last_logged_in FROM rhnWebContactEnabled wce inner join rhnUserInfo UI on UI.user_id = wce.id WHERE wce.org_id = :org_id ORDER BY wce.login_uc

mode.name: disabled_in_org
mode.query: SELECT wcd.id AS ID, wcd.login, wcd.login_uc, 1 as selectable, (select max(wccl_exists.date_completed) from rhnWebContactChangeLog wccl_exists where wcd.id= wccl_exists.web_contact_id) as change_date, UI.last_logged_in FROM rhnWebContactDisabled wcd inner join rhnUserInfo UI on UI.user_id = wcd.id WHERE wcd.org_id = :org_id ORDER BY wcd.login_uc
mode.elaborator: SELECT UIOO.user_id as id, user_login, user_first_name, user_last_name, role_names, last_logged_in, date_completed as change_date, WUPI.first_names as changed_by_first_name, WUPI.last_name as changed_by_last_name, 'disabled' as status, WUPI.email as email FROM rhnUsersInOrgOverview UIOO, rhnUserInfo UI, rhnWebContactChangeLog WCCL, web_user_personal_info WUPI WHERE UIOO.user_id IN (%s) AND UI.user_id = UIOO.user_id AND WCCL.web_contact_id = UI.user_id AND WCCL.date_completed = (select max(wccl_exists.date_completed) from rhnWebContactChangeLog wccl_exists where WCCL.web_contact_id = wccl_exists.web_contact_id) AND WUPI.web_user_id = WCCL.web_contact_from_id

datasource_modes.query: SELECT UIOO.user_id as id, user_login, user_first_name, user_last_name, role_names, server_count, server_group_count, last_logged_in, WUPI.email as email, nvl((select distinct wccs.label from rhnWebContactChangeLog wccl, rhnWebContactChangeState wccs where 1=1 and wccl.change_state_id = wccs.id and wccl.web_contact_id = UIOO.user_id and wccl.date_completed = (select max(wccl_exists.date_completed) from rhnWebContactChangeLog wccl_exists where wccl.web_contact_id = wccl_exists.web_contact_id)),'enabled') as status FROM rhnUsersInOrgOverview UIOO, rhnUserInfo UI, web_user_personal_info WUPI WHERE UIOO.user_id IN (%s) AND UI.user_id = UIOO.user_id AND UIOO.user_id = WUPI.web_user_id ORDER BY UPPER(user_login), UIOO.user_id

mode.name: default_system_groups
mode.query: SELECT system_group_id FROM rhnUserDefaultSystemGroups WHERE user_id = :user_id

mode.name: check_server_group_permissions
mode.query: select wc.id user_id, sg.id server_group_id from rhnServerGroup sg, web_contact wc, web_customer org where wc.id = :user_id and wc.org_id = org.id and sg.org_id = org.id and sg.id = :server_group_id and not exists ( select 1 from rhnUserServerGroupPerms usgp where usgp.user_id = :user_id and usgp.server_group_id = :server_group_id )

mode.name: check_server_group_permissions_for_revoke
mode.query: select usgp.server_group_id, usgp.user_id from rhnUserServerGroupPerms usgp where usgp.server_group_id = :server_group_id and exists ( select 1 from rhnServerGroup sg, web_contact wc where wc.id = :user_id and sg.id = :server_group_id and sg.org_id = wc.org_id )

mode.name: user_count
mode.query: SELECT count(id) as user_count FROM web_contact
